name: 混乱使者(Chaos Maker)
description:
"Chaos Maker" is a single-machine game of battle command and group struggle with animation style. It supports many people online. Players will play civilians and survive between mercenaries and zombies. Through active struggle, they will find a huge conspiracy behind mercenaries and zombies, and eventually destroy the manipulators behind the scenes, so that the city can return to peace.
Game features:

· Painting style integrates pixel and polygon elements

· Rich weapon systems combined with construction systems

· Excellent ai will not be easily defeated, can chase, shoot, follow, ambush and so on

· Support multiplayer online connection, with various ways of passing through customs and game modes
